page.title: 12RELIGION: FILKINS/EASTLEACH
page.content: Christianity appears to be the only re- ligion practised. The Anglican Church of St Peter is one of five in the Broadshire Group of parishes, adminis- tered by one vicar, with services held in each church in rotation. Most villa- gers are baptised and married in church but funeral services are now often fol- lowed by cremation. There are 40 resi- dents on the church electoral roll. The Methodist Chapel with 15 members, holds one service every Sunday, taken either by a minister from Carterton or by lay preachers; marriage, baptism & funeral services are also held. Both Church & Chapel support missionary work in Afri- ca and elsewhere. There are 3 Quakers & a small number of Roman Catholics in Filkins. The vicar of St Andrew's Church in Eastleach is also responsible for five parishes; the number of regular attenders there is 45.
